ygData.subject: RE: Digest Number 122
ygData.msgSnippet: Well i think the slowdown may be partially due to overcrowding.  also it seems whenever i go down into lower guk everyone already has a group of 6 or are
ygData.messageBody:
Well i think the slowdown may be partially due to overcrowding. also it seems
whenever i go down into lower guk everyone already has a group of 6 or are
higher
levels with a smaller group that don't need 6.


At 12:23 PM 12/16/99 -0500, you wrote:
>From: "Bennett, Brian" <BRIAN.BENNETT@...>
>
>I haven't been told that, in those exact words - but I have found slower
>(And fewer) responses to "Monk looking for work" shouts.
>
>And there have been some heated battles between know-it-all wizards, necros
>and druids who tell me that FD does to still work and I'm just not good at
>it :)


heh, there are always gonna be morons in any forum, heh.



>I had a lot more to say on the subject but then I'd be whining and it's just
>a game.

HEH. This was my point. I have seen a lot of griping that this fd patch makes
monks useless and they won't be able to find a group, etc. I know for me,
personally
i don't care and would accept anyone in the group if we needed a person and had
an opening. heck, you probably don't want to group with the power gamers who
would turn you down just because of that anyway. Anyway, I just wanted to see
if this was empty rhetoric or if there really was a difference in finding a
group.

I think I have my answer.
